description: Classic werewolf social deduction game where villagers must identify and eliminate werewolves before they're hunted down.

overrides.name: Werewolf
overrides.description: You are a Werewolf. Each night, hunt and eliminate a Villager while avoiding detection during the day.

abilities.name: Night Hunt
abilities.description: Work with other Werewolves to choose one Villager to eliminate each night.

card_instructions: You are a Werewolf. Keep this secret!
You know the identities of all other Werewolves.
Each night, work together to choose a Villager to eliminate.
During the day, blend in and avoid suspicion.
Win by equaling or outnumbering the Villagers.

flavor.flavor_text: Under the full moon, your true nature emerges...

overrides.name: Seer
overrides.description: You are the Seer. Each night, you can investigate one player to learn if they are a Werewolf or Villager.

abilities.name: Mystical Vision
abilities.description: Point to one player. The moderator will reveal if they are a Werewolf or Villager.

card_instructions: You are the Seer. Keep this secret!
Each night, investigate one player to learn their true nature.
Use your visions wisely without revealing yourself.
Win by eliminating all Werewolves.

flavor.flavor_text: Your mystical visions reveal the truth...

overrides.name: Doctor
overrides.description: You are the Village Doctor. Each night, you can protect one player from Werewolf attacks.

abilities.name: Medical Protection
abilities.description: Choose one player to protect from Werewolf attacks. You can protect yourself.
restrictions: Cannot protect the same player two nights in a row

card_instructions: You are the Doctor. Keep this secret!
Each night, protect one player from Werewolf attacks.
You cannot protect the same player twice in a row.
Win by eliminating all Werewolves.

flavor.flavor_text: Your medical expertise can save lives...

overrides.name: Hunter
overrides.description: You are the Hunter. Your tracking skills and combat prowess allow you to eliminate suspected Werewolves at night.

abilities.name: Hunter's Shot
abilities.description: Choose one player to eliminate during the night. You can do this up to 2 times per game. Be careful not to eliminate innocent Villagers!

card_instructions: You are the Hunter. Keep this secret!
You can eliminate up to 2 suspected Werewolves during night phases.
Use your shots wisely - you might accidentally eliminate a Villager!
Your hunting skills allow you to take action when needed.
Win by eliminating all Werewolves.

overrides.name: Villager
overrides.description: You are a regular Villager. Use your voice and vote to identify Werewolves.
card_instructions: You are a Villager.
You have no special abilities.
Use logic and discussion to find the Werewolves.
Vote to eliminate suspected Werewolves.
Win by eliminating all Werewolves.

flavor.flavor_text: You must protect your village from the darkness...

overrides.name: Alpha Werewolf
overrides.description: You are the Alpha Werewolf, leader of the pack. You appear as a Villager to Seer investigations.

abilities.name: Alpha Hunt
abilities.description: Lead the Werewolf pack in choosing one Villager to eliminate each night.

abilities.name: Human Disguise
abilities.description: You appear as a Villager to Seer investigations.

card_instructions: You are the Alpha Werewolf. Keep this secret!
You appear as a Villager to Seer investigations.
Lead the pack in hunting Villagers each night.
Win by equaling or outnumbering the Villagers.

flavor.flavor_text: As the Alpha, you command the pack...

day_announcement_templates.elimination: Last night, {player_name} was attacked by Werewolves. They were {role}.
day_announcement_templates.saved: Last night, Werewolves attacked, but the Doctor saved their target!
day_announcement_templates.vote_out: {player_name} has been eliminated by the village. They were {role}.

flavor_text.game_start: Werewolves have infiltrated the village! Find them before they hunt you all down.
flavor_text.town_win: The village has prevailed! All Werewolves have been eliminated.
flavor_text.mafia_win: The Werewolves have won! They now control the village.
flavor_text.night_falls: Night falls over the village. Everyone close your eyes and go to sleep.
flavor_text.day_breaks: Dawn breaks over the village. Everyone open your eyes.
